full_summary:
### Issuing Agency
Transport Canada (Transports Canada)

### Publication Date: 
June 12, 2024

### Solicitation Number:

T8080-240083

### Expiration Date: 
June 24, 2024 @ 12:00 PM (Noon)

### Closing Date:
 June 24, 2024 @ 12:00 PM (Noon)

### Description:
Transport Canada is seeking a supplier for the purchase and delivery of rotary office chairs.

### Specifications
 UNSPC Codes: 56101500, 56101504, 56101700
 UNSPC Description: Furniture, Chairs, Office Furniture

### Category
Procurement Category: Goods and Services

### Tendering Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Notice Type
RFP against Supply Arrangement

### Selection Criteria
 Lowest Price

### Delivery Requirements
 Delivery Regions: 
 Alberta
 Canada

### Tender Closing Date: 
 June 24, 2024 @ 12:00 PM (Noon)
 
### Publication Language
 English and French 

### Supporting Documents
Available for download at the following [locations](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40107/t8080-240083---solicitation-amd-001---en.pdf).

### Contracting Authority
